verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and they were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H7755>Socoh,<s%> which belongs to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> between <S%H7755>Socoh<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> in <S%H658>Ephesdammim.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> and set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the one <S%H3478>side,<s%> and Israel <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the other <S%H1516>side:<s%> and there was a valley between them.

There went <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H376>champion<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath,<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> whose <S%H1363>height<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2239>span.<s%>

He had a <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he was <S%H3847>clad<s%> with a <S%H8302>coat<s%> of <S%H7193>mail;<s%> and the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H8302>coat<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>
He had <S%H5178>brass<s%> shin <S%H4697>armor<s%> on his <S%H7272>legs,<s%> and a <S%H3591>javelin<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> between his <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

The <S%H6086>staff<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam;<s%> and his <S%H2595>spear<s%>'s <S%H3852>head<s%> weighed <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and his <S%H6793>shield<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

He <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3318>them,<s%> "Why have you come out to set your <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array?<s%> Am I not a <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and you <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul?<s%> <S%H1262>Choose<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H3381>yourselves,<s%> and let him come down to me.

If he be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H5221>me,<s%> and kill <S%H5650>me,<s%> then will we be your servants; but if I <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against <S%H5221>him,<s%> and kill <S%H5650>him,<s%> then you will be our servants, and serve <S%H5647>us.<s%>"

The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day!<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H376>man,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H3162>together!<s%>"

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> they were <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of that <S%H376>Ephrathite<s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3448>Jesse;<s%> and he had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>was<s%> an old <S%H2204>man<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> stricken among <S%H582>men.<s%>

The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> were <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H4932>next<s%> to him <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H6996>youngest;<s%> and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>
Now <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> back and <S%H7725>forth<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H7925>morning<s%> and <S%H6150>evening,<s%> and <S%H3320>presented<s%> himself <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "Now <S%H3947>take<s%> for your <S%H251>brothers<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7039>parched<s%> <S%H6235>grain,<s%> and these ten <S%H3899>loaves,<s%> and <S%H7323>carry<s%> them quickly to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers;<s%>

and <S%H935>bring<s%> these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2461>cheeses<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of their <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H6485>see<s%> how your <S%H251>brothers<s%> are <S%H7965>doing,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> back <S%H6161>news.<s%>"
Now <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H376>they,<s%> and all the men of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H3898>fighting<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5203>left<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> with a <S%H8104>keeper,<s%> and <S%H5375>took,<s%> and <S%H3212>went,<s%> as <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H935>him;<s%> and he came to the <S%H4570>place<s%> of the <S%H2428>wagons,<s%> as the army which was going <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4634>fight<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> put the battle in <S%H6186>array,<s%> <S%H4634>army<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4634>army.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5203>left<s%> his <S%H3627>baggage<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3627>baggage,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> to the <S%H4634>army,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7592>greeted<s%> his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

As he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H5927>them,<s%> behold, there came up the <S%H376>champion,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> out of the <S%H4634>ranks<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> according to the <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> heard <S%H8085>them.<s%>
All the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>him,<s%> and <S%H3966>were<s%> <S%H3372>terrified.<s%>

The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> who has come <S%H5927>up?<s%> He has surely come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> It shall <S%H376>be,<s%> that the man who <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H4428>him,<s%> the king will <S%H6238>enrich<s%> him with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H5975>stood<s%> by <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "What shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and takes <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> For who is this <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> that he should <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%>"
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> him in this <S%H1697>way,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "So shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> who kills <S%H5221>him.<s%>"

<S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H582>men;<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1732>David,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why have you come <S%H3381>down?<s%> With whom have you <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2007>those<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H2087>pride,<s%> and the <S%H7455>naughtiness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for you have come <S%H3381>down<s%> that you might <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>"
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What have I now <S%H6213>done?<s%> Is there not a <S%H1697>cause?<s%>"

He <S%H5437>turned<s%> away from <S%H681>him<s%> <S%H4136>toward<s%> <S%H312>another,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> like that <S%H1697>again;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1697>answered<s%> him <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7223>same<s%> <S%H1697>way.<s%>

When the <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard<s%> which <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> they <S%H5046>rehearsed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and he sent for <S%H3947>him.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Let no <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5307>fail<s%> because of <S%H5650>him.<s%> Your servant will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with this <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> against this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H5288>him;<s%> for you are but a youth, and he a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> was <S%H7462>keeping<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> and when a <S%H738>lion<s%> or a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> out of the <S%H5739>flock,<s%>

I went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck <S%H5337>him,<s%> and rescued it out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> When he <S%H6965>arose<s%> against <S%H2388>me,<s%> I caught him by his <S%H2206>beard,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> and killed him.

Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> both the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear.<s%> This <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> shall be as <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2778>them,<s%> since he has defied the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> who <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H738>lion,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H1677>bear,<s%> he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of this <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>" <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go;<s%> and Yahweh shall be with <S%H3068>you.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3847>dressed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H4055>clothing.<s%> He <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H6959>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he <S%H3847>clad<s%> him with a coat of <S%H8302>mail.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2296>strapped<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> on his <S%H4055>clothing,<s%> and he <S%H2974>tried<s%> to <S%H3212>move;<s%> for he had not <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H1732>it.<s%> David <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "I <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H3201>these;<s%> for I have not <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H1732>them.<s%>" David took them off.

He <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4731>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> for himself <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2512>smooth<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>'s <S%H3627>bag<s%> which he <S%H3219>had,<s%> even in his wallet. His <S%H7050>sling<s%> was in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H3212>came<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%> and drew <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H1732>David;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H6793>shield<s%> went before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> looked <S%H5027>about,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> he <S%H959>disdained<s%> <S%H5288>him;<s%> for he was but a youth, and <S%H132>ruddy,<s%> and withal of a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H4758>face.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "Am I a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> that you <S%H935>come<s%> to me with <S%H4731>sticks?<s%>" The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> by his <S%H430>gods.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come<s%> to <S%H5414>me,<s%> and I will give your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> "You <S%H935>come<s%> to me with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with a <S%H2595>spear,<s%> and with a <S%H3591>javelin:<s%> but I <S%H935>come<s%> to you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom you have <S%H2778>defied.<s%>

<S%H3117>Today,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5462>deliver<s%> you into my <S%H3027>hand.<s%> I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5493>you,<s%> and take your <S%H7218>head<s%> from off <S%H5414>you.<s%> I will give the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to the wild <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> that all the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and that all this <S%H6951>assembly<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3467>doesn't<s%> save with <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H2595>spear:<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s, and he will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

It <S%H6430>happened,<s%> when the Philistine <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>came<s%> and drew <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> toward the <S%H4634>army<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H3627>bag,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7049>slung<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and struck the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> in his <S%H4696>forehead;<s%> and the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2883>sank<s%> into his <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> and he <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> with a <S%H7050>sling<s%> and with a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H2719>him;<s%> but there was no sword in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> over the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H8025>drew<s%> it out of its <S%H8593>sheath,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H3772>him,<s%> and cut off his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6430>therewith.<s%> When the Philistines <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1368>champion<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> until you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1516>Gai,<s%> and to the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron.<s%> The <S%H2491>wounded<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H8189>Shaaraim,<s%> even to <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and to <S%H6138>Ekron.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H1814>chasing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and they <S%H8155>plundered<s%> their <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> but he <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H74>Abner,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> <S%H74>"Abner,<s%> whose <S%H1121>son<s%> is this <S%H5288>youth?<s%>" <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> I <S%H518>can't<s%> <S%H3045>tell.<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7592>"Inquire<s%> whose <S%H1121>son<s%> the young man <S%H5958>is!<s%>"

As <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H935>him,<s%> and brought him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> with the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>him,<s%> "Whose son are <S%H5288>you,<s%> you young man?" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Bethlehemite.<s%>"
